short_summary: Industry Sustainment Business Case Analysis (SBCA) Workshop
full_summary:
```markdown
## Tender Notice: Industry Sustainment Business Case Analysis (SBCA) Workshops

### Date: 
**2024-09-16 (08:00 AM - 12:00 PM EDT), 2024-11-19 (08:00 AM - 12:00 PM EST)**

### Purpose:
This notice invites industry representatives to participate in the Industry Sustainment Business Case Analysis (SBCA) Workshops. The workshops aim to educate industry stakeholders on Defence Materiel Sustainment and its strategic context, the SBCA process, and their role in supporting the SBCA process.

### Description:
The SBCA is a rigorous analytical process that guides sustainment teams in developing flexible, scalable, and principles-based sustainment solutions. The workshops will provide industry with a better understanding of how materiel sustainment and SBCA may affect the delivery of sustainment solutions for military equipment.

### Objectives:
- To educate industry stakeholders on the SBCA process and its strategic context
- To understand the role of industry in supporting the SBCA process
- To gain insight into how materiel sustainment and SBCA may affect the delivery of sustainment solutions for military equipment

### Criteria:
Industry participants will not be competing for contracts. The workshops' primary goal is to engage industry in discussions on commercial sustainment considerations, opportunities for innovation, and mutual risk reduction.

### Workshop Details:
- Location: Microsoft Teams
- Duration: 30 minutes (to be decided)
- Invitation: will be sent 1-2 weeks prior to the workshop date
- Workshop Materials: presentation slides and a copy of the workshop presentation

### Notice:
Please send an email to [TPSGC.PASoutiendelaDefense-APDefenceSustainment.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PASoutiendelaDefense-APDefenceSustainment.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) to register for the workshops. Please provide your name, email address, company name, and position. Registration should be completed no later than two weeks prior to the workshop date.

### Contact Information:
- Name: Sophie Archambault
- Email: [TPSGC.PASoutiendelaDefense-APDefenceSustainment.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PASoutiendelaDefense-APDefenceSustain
